value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

val.desc: Works when model ('value') is Array. It tells the component which value should add/remove when ticked/unticked

true-value.desc: What model value should be considered as checked/ticked/on?

false-value.desc: What model value should be considered as unchecked/unticked/off?

label.desc: Label to display along the component (or use the default slot instead of this prop)
examples: I agree with the Terms and Conditions

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the component

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when the component is unticked/ off?

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

indeterminate-value.desc: What model value should be considered as 'indeterminate'?

toggle-indeterminate.desc: When user clicks/taps on the component, should we toggle through the indeterminate state too?

default.desc: Default slot can be used as label, unless 'label' prop is specified; Suggestion: string

input.desc: Emitted when component's model changes; Is also used by v-model
